rails_app/name.description: A name for the Ruby on Rails application; default is rails_app.

rails_app/path.description: The path to deploy the Ruby on Rails application to; default is /usr/local/rails_app.

rails_app/gems.description: An array of additional gems to install.

rails_app/use_bundler.description: If true, bundler will always be used; if false it will never be; defaults to true if gems includes bundler.

rails_app/owner.description: System owner of the deployed application; default is root.

rails_app/group.description: System group of the deployed application; default is root.

rails_app/memcached/enabled.description: Whether to enable memcached; default is false.

rails_app/repository/url.description: The URL to the application in source control.

rails_app/repository/revision.description: The revision (or git ref) of the application in source control.

rails_app/repository/deploy_key.description: The deploy key for the application in source control.

rails_app/database/enable.description: Whether to enable configuration of database for the application.

rails_app/database/schema.description: The schema or name of the database for the application to use.

rails_app/database/username.description: The username of the database for the application to use.

rails_app/database/password.description: The password of the database for the application to use.

rails_app/http_server.description: The HTTP server to use for the rails application.

rails_app/server_aliases.description: Host aliases to configure with the HTTP server.

rails_app/apache2/webapp_template/file.description: The name of the Chef template to use with apache2.

rails_app/apache2/webapp_template/extra_.description: Extra parameters for the apache2 template.

rails_app/unicorn/preload_app.description: Unicorn preload app; default is false

rails_app/unicorn/worker_processes.description: Number of worker processes to spawn; default is 4

recipes.rails_app: Includes dependencies and sets up a Ruby on Rails application server.
recipes.rails_app::application: Sets up a Ruby on Rails application server.
